title: How much should I charge for an 800 word article? - Quora

response.answer_text: How much should I charge for an 800 word article? “Recently clients have been paying between twenty pounds and twenty-five thousand pounds for articles of this size…” If asked the Client’s version of this question - “But what will it cost me?” - in a Sales Conversation, at any point before you are ready to name your price, this should be your response. You should continue:- “… so please can we get back to talking about what you want this article to achieve.” Only once you have completely understood their problems, their motivation, all the circumstances, and their perception of the value their desired solution will deliver to them, will you be in a position to know how much to charge.
Depends on the article subject. Arts tech history sports civics productivity etc. If 800 word article copied from no one and very creative writing, then charge 30$ least.
